protected_text: <ALIMT >(PH_1)</ALIMT>->Nature is full of genius and divinity — not a snowflake escapes its fashioning hand.

text: good_opinion(INITIATOR_trait==kind)->Kindness is like snow. It beautifies everything it covers.

text: good_opinion(INITIATOR_trait==ascetic)->To appreciate the beauty of a snowflake it is necessary to stand out in the cold.
protected_text: <ALIMT >(PH_1)</ALIMT>->To appreciate the beauty of a snowflake it is necessary to stand out in the cold.

text: good_opinion->When it snows, one may either shovel or make snow angels [optimist_pessimist]
protected_text: <ALIMT >(PH_2)</ALIMT>When it snows, one may either shovel or make snow angels <ALIMT >(PH_1)</ALIMT>

text: r_logentry(INITIATOR_trait==pessimist)->Everything we do is meaningless. So, why care answering that?
protected_text: <ALIMT >(PH_1)</ALIMT>->Everything we do is meaningless. So, why care answering that?

protected_text: <ALIMT >(PH_1)</ALIMT>->Nothing we do will be remembered, eventually. So, why care answering that?

text: r_logentry(INITIATOR_trait==optimist)->Life is what you make of it — so make it good, today!
protected_text: <ALIMT >(PH_1)</ALIMT>->Life is what you make of it — so make it good, today!

text: r_logentry(INITIATOR_trait==teetotaler)->I don't know its meaning — but I know it should be free of drugs.
protected_text: <ALIMT >(PH_1)</ALIMT>->I don't know its meaning — but I know it should be free of <ALIMT >drugs</ALIMT>.

text: r_logentry(INITIATOR_trait==industrious)->Working hard to achieve all our goals!
protected_text: <ALIMT >(PH_1)</ALIMT>->Working hard to achieve all our goals!

text: r_logentry(INITIATOR_trait==slothful)->I don't know its meaning — but I know it should be on a comfy couch.
protected_text: <ALIMT >(PH_1)</ALIMT>->I don't know its meaning — but I know it should be on a comfy couch.

text: r_logentry(INITIATOR_trait==bloodlust)->Meaning?! I live for the kill — that's meaning enough!
protected_text: <ALIMT >(PH_1)</ALIMT>->Meaning?! I live for the kill — that's meaning enough!

text: r_logentry(INITIATOR_trait==brawler)->I don't know its meaning — but a good fistfight gives meaning to my life!
protected_text: <ALIMT >(PH_1)</ALIMT>->I don't know its meaning — but a good fistfight gives meaning to my life!

text: r_logentry(INITIATOR_trait==masochist)->I don't know its meaning — but a little bit of pain always makes my life worth living.
protected_text: <ALIMT >(PH_1)</ALIMT>->I don't know its meaning — but a little bit of <ALIMT >pain</ALIMT> always makes my life worth living.

text: r_logentry(INITIATOR_trait==body modder)->We must surpass our biological bodies and become the ultimate being!
protected_text: <ALIMT >(PH_1)</ALIMT>->We must surpass our biological bodies and become the ultimate being!

text: r_logentry(INITIATOR_trait==body purist)->Life is about making sure we maximize our natural capabilities.
protected_text: <ALIMT >(PH_1)</ALIMT>->Life is about making sure we maximize our natural capabilities.

text: r_logentry(INITIATOR_trait==greedy)->Money, power, sex — these are what give meaning to our lives!
protected_text: <ALIMT >(PH_1)</ALIMT>->Money, power, <ALIMT >sex</ALIMT> — these are what give meaning to our lives!

text: r_logentry(INITIATOR_trait==ascetic)->We live to revere the Cosmos — and the Cosmos lives to give meaning to our existence.
protected_text: <ALIMT >(PH_1)</ALIMT>->We live to revere the Cosmos — and the Cosmos lives to give meaning to our existence.

text: r_logentry(INITIATOR_trait==ascetic)->Freedom from suffering and having clear judgement — this is our ultimate goal.
protected_text: <ALIMT >(PH_1)</ALIMT>->Freedom from suffering and having clear judgement — this is our ultimate goal.

text: r_logentry(INITIATOR_trait==gourmand)->I don't know its meaning — but I know food and drink are the purest forms of joy!
protected_text: <ALIMT >(PH_1)</ALIMT>->I don't know its meaning — but I know food and drink are the purest forms of joy!

text: r_logentry(INITIATOR_trait==pyromaniac)->Life is about hungrily exploiting all that's around us, like a spreading wild fire!
protected_text: <ALIMT >(PH_1)</ALIMT>->Life is about hungrily exploiting all that's around us, like a spreading wild fire!

text: r_logentry(INITIATOR_trait==tortured artist)->Does any of us really have a meaning to life?
protected_text: <ALIMT >(PH_1)</ALIMT>->Does any of us really have a meaning to life?

text: r_logentry(INITIATOR_trait==kind)->Making other people's life happy and fulfilled — so that they can make us happy too.
protected_text: <ALIMT >(PH_1)</ALIMT>->Making other people's life happy and fulfilled — so that they can make us happy too.

text: r_logentry(DAYPERIOD==night)->Isn't it a bit too late for a question like that?!
protected_text: <ALIMT >(PH_1)</ALIMT>->Isn't it a bit too late for a question like that?!

text: r_logentry(INITIATOR_artistic_passion!=None)->Art and the true expression of oneself give full meaning to our lives.
protected_text: <ALIMT >(PH_1)</ALIMT>->Art and the true expression of oneself give full meaning to our lives.

text: r_logentry(INITIATOR_social_passion!=None)->I don't know its meaning — but I know a long conversation and a good soft drink make it much better!
protected_text: <ALIMT >(PH_1)</ALIMT>->I don't know its meaning — but I know a long conversation and a good soft drink make it much better!

text: r_logentry(INITIATOR_construction_passion!=None)->Creating lasting works to improve our surroundings and inspire future generations.
protected_text: <ALIMT >(PH_1)</ALIMT>->Creating lasting works to improve our surroundings and inspire future generations.

text: r_logentry(priority=-1)->Why ask me? I have no idea.
protected_text: <ALIMT >(PH_1)</ALIMT>->Why ask me? I have no idea.

text: r_logentry(INITIATOR_opinion<0)->Why do you wonder that, if your life is obviously a meaningless sequence of failed efforts?
protected_text: <ALIMT >(PH_1)</ALIMT>->Why do you wonder that, if your life is obviously a meaningless sequence of failed efforts?

text: r_logentry(priority=-1)->I wouldn't like to speak about it...
protected_text: <ALIMT >(PH_1)</ALIMT>->I wouldn't like to speak about it...

text: tribe_child->I had no technology during my childhood. We survived on the land and moved with the Muffalo, [recipient].
protected_text: <ALIMT >(PH_2)</ALIMT>I had no technology during my childhood. We survived on the land and moved with the Muffalo, <ALIMT >(PH_1)</ALIMT>.

text: tribe_child->I lived a nomadic lifestyle — living off the land and moving alongside muffalos.
protected_text: <ALIMT >(PH_1)</ALIMT>I lived a nomadic lifestyle — living off the land and moving alongside muffalos.

text: tribe_child->I miss being able to roam free with the Muffalo and playing sticks and stones.
protected_text: <ALIMT >(PH_1)</ALIMT>I miss being able to roam free with the Muffalo and playing sticks and stones.

text: tribe_child->My childhood was full of nature. These new technologies are both confusing and scary.
protected_text: <ALIMT >(PH_1)</ALIMT>My childhood was full of nature. These new technologies are both confusing and scary.

text: tribe_child->I grew up learning how to survive off the land and animals around us.
protected_text: <ALIMT >(PH_1)</ALIMT>I grew up learning how to survive off the land and animals around us.

text: abandoned_child->When my parents had me, I was as sick as a dog and left me for dead. Through the powers that be, I managed to make it here today.
protected_text: <ALIMT >(PH_1)</ALIMT>When my parents had me, I was as sick as a dog and left me for dead. Through the powers that be, I managed to make it here today.

text: abandoned_child->It's a miracle I made it into adulthood. I was abandoned as a baby and, only through sheer luck, I lived.
protected_text: <ALIMT >(PH_1)</ALIMT>It's a miracle I made it into adulthood. I was abandoned as a baby and, only through sheer luck, I lived.

text: abandoned_child->Well, [recipient]... Due to being abandoned by my parents, I really didn't have a childhood...
protected_text: <ALIMT >(PH_2)</ALIMT>Well, <ALIMT >(PH_1)</ALIMT>... Due to being abandoned by my parents, I really didn't have a childhood...

text: reclusive_child->I spent a majority of my childhood to myself, contemplating great wonders and whether or not the nearest berry would kill me!
protected_text: <ALIMT >(PH_1)</ALIMT>I spent a majority of my childhood to myself, contemplating great wonders and whether or not the nearest berry would kill me!

text: reclusive_child->During my childhood, [recipient], I basically always stuck to myself.
protected_text: <ALIMT >(PH_2)</ALIMT>During my childhood, <ALIMT >(PH_1)</ALIMT>, I basically always stuck to myself.

text: reclusive_child->I often roamed around the woods for weeks at a time, much to my caretakers' dismay.
protected_text: <ALIMT >(PH_1)</ALIMT>I often roamed around the woods for weeks at a time, much to my caretakers' dismay.

text: reclusive_child->I wasn't a very social child, [recipient]. I preferred to keep to myself.
protected_text: <ALIMT >(PH_2)</ALIMT>I wasn't a very social child, <ALIMT >(PH_1)</ALIMT>. I preferred to keep to myself.

text: herder->I spent most of my childhood tending to the Muffalo and the sick animals — quiet but honest work.
protected_text: <ALIMT >(PH_1)</ALIMT>I spent most of my childhood tending to the Muffalo and the sick animals — quiet but honest work.

text: herder->I protected the Muffalo from both predators and nature itself — I had no time for childish games.
protected_text: <ALIMT >(PH_1)</ALIMT>I protected the Muffalo from both predators and nature itself — I had no time for childish games.

text: herder->The Tribe relied on me to keep the Muffalo safe from both sickness and predation.
protected_text: <ALIMT >(PH_1)</ALIMT>The Tribe relied on me to keep the Muffalo safe from both sickness and predation.

text: herder->I disliked being around other people, [recipient] — but the Muffalo made great company.
protected_text: <ALIMT >(PH_2)</ALIMT>I disliked being around other people, <ALIMT >(PH_1)</ALIMT> — but the Muffalo made great company.

text: scavenger->I was a brave adventurer into the unknown, scavenging for treasure and trash alike!
protected_text: <ALIMT >(PH_1)</ALIMT>I was a brave adventurer into the unknown, scavenging for treasure and trash alike!

text: scavenger->I avoided a lot of the grunt work — instead, I explored wrecks and ruins.
protected_text: <ALIMT >(PH_1)</ALIMT>I avoided a lot of the grunt work — instead, I explored wrecks and ruins.

text: scavenger->During my childhood, I got into a lot of troublesome scavengings — but sometimes it paid off!
protected_text: <ALIMT >(PH_1)</ALIMT>During my childhood, I got into a lot of troublesome scavengings — but sometimes it paid off!

text: cave_child->I spent a lot of time in an elaborate cave system, helping develop it into a thriving Tribe!
protected_text: <ALIMT >(PH_1)</ALIMT>I spent a lot of time in an elaborate cave system, helping develop it into a thriving Tribe!

text: cave_child->Well, [recipient] — I grew up in a mountain full of caves. It wasn't as cold and wet as it sounds.
protected_text: <ALIMT >(PH_2)</ALIMT>Well, <ALIMT >(PH_1)</ALIMT> — I grew up in a mountain full of caves. It wasn't as cold and wet as it sounds.

text: cave_child->Growing mushrooms and cleaning mold out of caves was a normality for me. You wouldn't believe how fast those grow!
protected_text: <ALIMT >(PH_1)</ALIMT>Growing mushrooms and cleaning mold out of caves was a normality for me. You wouldn't believe how fast those grow!

text: sole_survivor->After my original Tribe was wiped out, I was adopted by a new Tribe where I mostly farmed and cooked.
protected_text: <ALIMT >(PH_1)</ALIMT>After my original Tribe was wiped out, I was adopted by a new Tribe where I mostly farmed and cooked.

text: sole_survivor->I was nearly killed, [recipient] — and ever since then I spent most of my time tending the crops and helping cooking.
protected_text: <ALIMT >(PH_2)</ALIMT>I was nearly killed, <ALIMT >(PH_1)</ALIMT> — and ever since then I spent most of my time tending the crops and helping cooking.

text: sole_survivor->I was the sole survivor of a horrific raid on my Tribe — it was tough, until I found a new Tribe...
protected_text: <ALIMT >(PH_1)</ALIMT>I was the sole survivor of a horrific raid on my Tribe — it was tough, until I found a new Tribe...

text: vengeful_child->I swear I will eliminate every last one of those bandits that razed my village.
protected_text: <ALIMT >(PH_1)</ALIMT>I swear I will eliminate every last one of those bandits that razed my village.

text: vengeful_child->If you ever meet one of those filthy bandits that razed my village, [recipient], I would love for you to tell me.
protected_text: <ALIMT >(PH_2)</ALIMT>If you ever meet one of those filthy bandits that razed my village, <ALIMT >(PH_1)</ALIMT>, I would love for you to tell me.

text: vengeful_child->I grew up in a lovely village [recipient] — at least it was beautiful until it was sacked and burned by bandits...
protected_text: <ALIMT >(PH_2)</ALIMT>I grew up in a lovely village <ALIMT >(PH_1)</ALIMT> — at least it was beautiful until it was sacked and burned by bandits...

text: fire_keeper->I had the most important job one could have in a Tribe — firekeeping. Without me, we would have all died.
protected_text: <ALIMT >(PH_1)</ALIMT>I had the most important job one could have in a Tribe — firekeeping. Without me, we would have all died.

text: fire_keeper->Do you know what a fire keeper is, [recipient]? That was my childhood.
protected_text: <ALIMT >(PH_2)</ALIMT>Do you know what a fire keeper is, <ALIMT >(PH_1)</ALIMT>? That was my childhood.

text: fire_keeper->Being a fire keeper meant I had to mature quickly and forgo regular childhood activities.
protected_text: <ALIMT >(PH_1)</ALIMT>Being a fire keeper meant I had to <ALIMT >mature</ALIMT> quickly and forgo regular childhood activities.

text: hideaway->My parents kept me at home all the time, so I focused on skills like crafting and my hobbies!
protected_text: <ALIMT >(PH_1)</ALIMT>My parents kept me at home all the time, so I focused on skills like crafting and my hobbies!

text: hideaway->I didn't really hang out with other children, [recipient] — instead I stayed home with my parents.
protected_text: <ALIMT >(PH_2)</ALIMT>I didn't really hang out with other children, <ALIMT >(PH_1)</ALIMT> — instead I stayed home with my parents.

text: hideaway->As a child I mostly stayed at home, sheltered from the dangerous world we lived in.
protected_text: <ALIMT >(PH_1)</ALIMT>As a child I mostly stayed at home, sheltered from the dangerous world we lived in.

text: crash_baby->I crash landed from the stars as a baby. I was extremely lucky to have been found by my Tribe shortly after!
protected_text: <ALIMT >(PH_1)</ALIMT>I crash landed from the stars as a baby. I was extremely lucky to have been found by my Tribe shortly after!

text: crash_baby->I was the only survivor of a horrific spacecraft crash as a baby, and luckily a local Tribe took me in.
protected_text: <ALIMT >(PH_1)</ALIMT>I was the only survivor of a horrific spacecraft crash as a baby, and luckily a local Tribe took me in.

text: crash_baby->I was adopted by a Tribe as a baby, [recipient]. Surviving the crash of the ship was pure luck.
protected_text: <ALIMT >(PH_2)</ALIMT>I was adopted by a Tribe as a baby, <ALIMT >(PH_1)</ALIMT>. Surviving the crash of the ship was pure luck.

text: budding_artist->My childhood was full of art exhibits and selling art to societies from all over the galaxy.
protected_text: <ALIMT >(PH_1)</ALIMT>My childhood was full of art exhibits and selling art to societies from all over the galaxy.

text: budding_artist->Perhaps you have heard of me, [recipient] — I was a rather popular artist in my youth and now!
protected_text: <ALIMT >(PH_2)</ALIMT>Perhaps you have heard of me, <ALIMT >(PH_1)</ALIMT> — I was a rather popular artist in my youth and now!

text: budding_artist->I spent most of my time creating art and talking to socialites about my art.
protected_text: <ALIMT >(PH_1)</ALIMT>I spent most of my time creating art and talking to socialites about my art.

text: bully->I was forced to join a hunting party as a kid... I think this was because of how I acted around other children.
protected_text: <ALIMT >(PH_1)</ALIMT>I was <ALIMT >forced</ALIMT> to join a hunting party as a kid... I think this was because of how I acted around other children.

text: bully->I don't know why [recipient], but for some reason the elders put me on a hunting party at a young age.
protected_text: <ALIMT >(PH_2)</ALIMT>I don't know why <ALIMT >(PH_1)</ALIMT>, but for some reason the elders put me on a hunting party at a young age.

text: bully->I spent a majority of my time hunting animals, and when I wasn't hunting animals I was roughing up other kids. *chuckles*
protected_text: <ALIMT >(PH_1)</ALIMT>I spent a majority of my time hunting animals, and when I wasn't hunting animals I was roughing up other kids. *chuckles*

text: bookworm->I always had my face buried in a book, they are far more interesting than people.
protected_text: <ALIMT >(PH_1)</ALIMT>I always had my face buried in a book, they are far more interesting than people.

text: bookworm->Most of my childhood was spent reading. While we are on the topic, do you have any books [recipient]?
protected_text: <ALIMT >(PH_2)</ALIMT>Most of my childhood was spent reading. While we are on the topic, do you have any books <ALIMT >(PH_1)</ALIMT>?

text: bookworm->I stayed away from most other kids, preferring the wondrous lands and adventures only a book can supply.
protected_text: <ALIMT >(PH_1)</ALIMT>I stayed away from most other kids, preferring the wondrous lands and adventures only a book can supply.

text: industrial_orphan->My oldest memories are of the drudgery in mines and workhouses. I don't even remember my parents.
protected_text: <ALIMT >(PH_1)</ALIMT>My oldest memories are of the drudgery in mines and workhouses. I don't even remember my parents.

text: industrial_orphan->I was adopted into the workforce of the industrial world. I never went to school, all I learned was what was needed for the job.
protected_text: <ALIMT >(PH_1)</ALIMT>I was adopted into the workforce of the industrial world. I never went to school, all I learned was what was needed for the job.

text: industrial_orphan->I worked in the mines for as long as I remember [recipient], leaving little time for me to be a kid.
protected_text: <ALIMT >(PH_2)</ALIMT>I worked in the mines for as long as I remember <ALIMT >(PH_1)</ALIMT>, leaving little time for me to be a kid.

text: urbworld_urchin->I am from an Urbworld, [recipient]. We don't speak about the things I had to do as a kid.
protected_text: <ALIMT >(PH_2)</ALIMT>I am from an Urbworld, <ALIMT >(PH_1)</ALIMT>. We don't speak about the things I had to do as a kid.

text: urbworld_urchin->I grew up in a true hellscape, fighting for food and survival. Survival of the fittest is a lie; it is all luck.
protected_text: <ALIMT >(PH_1)</ALIMT>I grew up in a true hellscape, <ALIMT >fighting</ALIMT> for food and survival. Survival of the fittest is a lie; it is all luck.

text: urbworld_urchin->My childhood planet was neglected and avoided by others, used solely for profit and exploitation of our people. There wasn't a single thing I never had to fight for.
protected_text: <ALIMT >(PH_1)</ALIMT>My childhood planet was neglected and avoided by others, used solely for profit and exploitation of our people. There wasn't a single thing I never had to fight for.

text: test_subject->I was the test subject of a scientist on an urbworld — the experiments were torturous, cruel and unspeakable.
protected_text: <ALIMT >(PH_1)</ALIMT>I was the test subject of a scientist on an urbworld — the experiments were torturous, cruel and unspeakable.

text: test_subject->My entire youth was spent participating in experiments by a dreaded urbworld scientist.
protected_text: <ALIMT >(PH_1)</ALIMT>My entire youth was spent participating in experiments by a dreaded urbworld scientist.

text: test_subject->[recipient], you do not want to know the horrors I faced as a child. Not even the scientist who experimented on me spoke of them after.
protected_text: <ALIMT >(PH_2)</ALIMT><ALIMT >(PH_1)</ALIMT>, you do not want to know the horrors I faced as a child. Not even the scientist who experimented on me spoke of them after.

text: test_subject->Torture. There is no other word for what I grew up in, [recipient]. You would not understand.
protected_text: <ALIMT >(PH_2)</ALIMT><ALIMT >torture</ALIMT>. There is no other word for what I grew up in, <ALIMT >(PH_1)</ALIMT>. You would not understand.

text: test_subject->The horrors... You wouldn't believe me even if I had proof, [recipient].
protected_text: <ALIMT >(PH_2)</ALIMT>The horrors... You wouldn't believe me even if I had proof, <ALIMT >(PH_1)</ALIMT>.

text: wreckage_explorer->Instead of watching my family's herds, I spent a majority of my time exploring crashed warships.
protected_text: <ALIMT >(PH_1)</ALIMT>Instead of watching my family's herds, I spent a majority of my time exploring crashed warships.

text: wreckage_explorer->Have you ever explored a crashed warship, [recipient]? That's what I spent a majority of my childhood doing!
protected_text: <ALIMT >(PH_2)</ALIMT>Have you ever explored a crashed warship, <ALIMT >(PH_1)</ALIMT>? That's what I spent a majority of my childhood doing!

text: wreckage_explorer->Once, one of the animals I was herding ran away — eventually, it led me to a large crashed starship. That's when I found out I just loved wreckages!
protected_text: <ALIMT >(PH_1)</ALIMT>Once, one of the animals I was herding ran away — eventually, it led me to a large crashed starship. That's when I found out I just loved wreckages!

text: apocalypse_survivor->The planet I grew up on was destroyed by the very people that called it home. My parents and I had to go to extremes just to make it.
protected_text: <ALIMT >(PH_1)</ALIMT>The planet I grew up on was destroyed by the very people that called it home. My parents and I had to go to extremes just to make it.

text: apocalypse_survivor->I watched my planet slowly starve due to the unrest in its society. It took everything we had to survive.
protected_text: <ALIMT >(PH_1)</ALIMT>I watched my planet slowly starve due to the unrest in its society. It took everything we had to survive.

text: apocalypse_survivor->Our planet flooded and billions died, and it was a miracle my parents were able to support me.
protected_text: <ALIMT >(PH_1)</ALIMT>Our planet flooded and billions died, and it was a miracle my parents were able to support me.

text: caveworld_tender->The planet I grew up on was inhospitable, so we lived in a cave complex beneath the surface.
protected_text: <ALIMT >(PH_1)</ALIMT>The planet I grew up on was inhospitable, so we lived in a cave complex beneath the surface.

text: caveworld_tender->I spent most of my time tending the fungus farms with the other children, it was quiet but honest work.
protected_text: <ALIMT >(PH_1)</ALIMT>I spent most of my time tending the fungus farms with the other children, it was quiet but honest work.

text: caveworld_tender->I was always around people my age, often playing and farming with them.
protected_text: <ALIMT >(PH_1)</ALIMT>I was always around people my age, often playing and farming with them.

text: caveworld_tunneler->My entire childhood consisted of working as a cave digger. If there's a cave, I can navigate it.
protected_text: <ALIMT >(PH_1)</ALIMT>My entire childhood consisted of working as a cave digger. If there's a cave, I can navigate it.

text: caveworld_tunneler->I know rocks better than I know myself. I spent most of my time as a kid exploring and digging caves in a Caveworld.
protected_text: <ALIMT >(PH_1)</ALIMT>I know rocks better than I know myself. I spent most of my time as a kid exploring and digging caves in a Caveworld.

text: caveworld_tunneler->I spent my entire childhood in caves so I am not used to the sun [recipient].
protected_text: <ALIMT >(PH_2)</ALIMT>I spent my entire childhood in caves so I am not used to the sun <ALIMT >(PH_1)</ALIMT>.

text: scout->I was born to the administration of a rimworld colony. At a young age I was enrolled in a military scouting program.
protected_text: <ALIMT >(PH_1)</ALIMT>I was born to the administration of a rimworld colony. At a young age I was enrolled in a <ALIMT >military</ALIMT> scouting program.

text: scout->[recipient], I was raised to not ask questions and to follow orders.
protected_text: <ALIMT >(PH_2)</ALIMT><ALIMT >(PH_1)</ALIMT>, I was raised to not ask questions and to follow orders.

text: scout->My childhood consisted of scouting for the military. Survival and obeying orders are the core of my education.
protected_text: <ALIMT >(PH_1)</ALIMT>My childhood consisted of scouting for the <ALIMT >military</ALIMT>. Survival and obeying orders are the core of my education.

text: shelter_child->I grew up in a large shelter deep under the surface, which provided me with great education opportunities.
protected_text: <ALIMT >(PH_1)</ALIMT>I grew up in a large shelter deep under the surface, which provided me with great education opportunities.

text: shelter_child->I never got the chance to do any manual labor as a kid [recipient]. It may sound great but given our current situation it kinda sucks.

text: shelter_child->The planet I grew up on was a toxic wasteland, forcing us to live deep underground in a shelter.
protected_text: <ALIMT >(PH_1)</ALIMT>The planet I grew up on was a toxic wasteland, forcing us to live deep underground in a shelter.

text: vatgrown_soldier->I had a very short childhood that consisted of mostly combat training in a bioweapons facility.
protected_text: <ALIMT >(PH_1)</ALIMT>I had a very short childhood that consisted of mostly combat training in a bioweapons facility.

text: vatgrown_soldier->From birth I was trained with the intent to become an instrument of destruction with very little human contact.
protected_text: <ALIMT >(PH_1)</ALIMT>From birth I was trained with the intent to become an instrument of destruction with very little human contact.

text: vatgrown_soldier->[recipient], I didn't have a childhood — I was born and raised as a weapon, and nothing else.

text: vatgrown_soldier->I was created to be the ultimate weapon of destruction — [vatgrown_soldier_comment1]

text: vatgrown_soldier_comment1->then I was heavily trained to be one.

text: sickly_child->I was born with a rare disease that left me hospital ridden. I didn't have a big social life but I did learn a lot about science and medicine!
protected_text: <ALIMT >(PH_1)</ALIMT>I was born with a rare disease that left me hospital ridden. I didn't have a big social life but I did learn a lot about science and medicine!

text: sickly_child->I had little contact with others throughout my childhood, [recipient]. This led me to be a bit of a recluse...

text: sickly_child->As a child I suffered from a rare disease, leaving me bed-ridden and unable to exercise.
protected_text: <ALIMT >(PH_1)</ALIMT>As a child I suffered from a rare disease, leaving me bed-ridden and unable to exercise.

text: frightened_child->I am scared of telling you about my childhood [recipient]...
protected_text: <ALIMT >(PH_2)</ALIMT>I am scared of telling you about my childhood <ALIMT >(PH_1)</ALIMT>...

text: frightened_child->I never trusted doctors or food prepared by others, so I taught myself to cook and doctor myself from a young age.
protected_text: <ALIMT >(PH_1)</ALIMT>I never trusted doctors or food prepared by others, so I taught myself to cook and doctor myself from a young age.

text: frightened_child->My many fears and phobias from childhood still plague me today...
protected_text: <ALIMT >(PH_1)</ALIMT>My many fears and phobias from childhood still plague me today...

text: coma_child->I was in a coma for most of my childhood [recipient], thanks for asking.
protected_text: <ALIMT >(PH_2)</ALIMT>I was in a coma for most of my childhood <ALIMT >(PH_1)</ALIMT>, thanks for asking.

text: coma_child->My body is still weak from my many years in a coma. It sucks, but that is the hand I was dealt.
protected_text: <ALIMT >(PH_1)</ALIMT>My body is still weak from my many years in a coma. It sucks, but that is the hand I was dealt.

text: coma_child->A terrible accident put me into a coma until my late teens. Enjoy what memories you have, not everyone has some.
protected_text: <ALIMT >(PH_1)</ALIMT>A terrible accident put me into a coma until my late teens. Enjoy what memories you have, not everyone has some.

text: pyromaniac->I've always liked fire [recipient]. Like, I REALLY like fire...
protected_text: <ALIMT >(PH_2)</ALIMT>I've always liked fire <ALIMT >(PH_1)</ALIMT>. Like, I REALLY like fire...

text: pyromaniac->Fire was an integral part of my upbringing, I even burned down my house once!
protected_text: <ALIMT >(PH_1)</ALIMT>Fire was an integral part of my upbringing, I even burned down my house once!

text: pyromaniac->I used to set fire to the garbage piles, they are so mesmerizing. Wouldn't you agree [recipient]?
protected_text: <ALIMT >(PH_2)</ALIMT>I used to set fire to the garbage piles, they are so mesmerizing. Wouldn't you agree <ALIMT >(PH_1)</ALIMT>?

text: pyromaniac->I was born in fire, I used to live near fire, and I can't keep away from fire.

text: mute->Animals have always been better companions than humans to me [recipient], especially when I was young.

text: mute->After what happened to me, I stuck to myself and didn't really speak to anyone.
protected_text: <ALIMT >(PH_1)</ALIMT>After what happened to me, I stuck to myself and didn't really speak to anyone.

text: mute->Aside from the incident that left me scarred for life, I had a relatively normal childhood.

text: war_refugee->After my homeworld became stricken with war, my parents took me and hid wherever they could, teaching me defense as we moved from area to area.
protected_text: <ALIMT >(PH_1)</ALIMT>After my homeworld became stricken with war, my parents took me and hid wherever they could, teaching me defense as we moved from area to area.

text: war_refugee->Most of my childhood was spent running from danger. I witnessed many great atrocities, and my conclusion is that violence is never the answer.
protected_text: <ALIMT >(PH_1)</ALIMT>Most of my childhood was spent running from danger. I witnessed many great atrocities, and my conclusion is that violence is never the answer.

text: musical_kid->I always had a talent for instruments, and I spent a lot of time training and performing with lavish praise!
protected_text: <ALIMT >(PH_1)</ALIMT>I always had a talent for instruments, and I spent a lot of time training and performing with lavish praise!

protected_text: <ALIMT >(PH_1)</ALIMT>Most of my time was spent in front of a camera, acting or being interviewed. I hadn't a large need for education.

text: child_spy->I was taught at a very young age the art of espionage. I was then put undercover for many years of my childhood.
protected_text: <ALIMT >(PH_1)</ALIMT>I was taught at a very young age the art of espionage. I was then put undercover for many years of my childhood.

text: shop_kid->I mostly ran the shop for my mom when she would get sick, we sold some interesting artifacts, but I learned far more about trade than the items themselves.

text: organ_farm->I was raised in an organ farm where my body was used to grow implants for wounded mercenaries, and although it is quite gruesome I learned a lot about medicine during it all.
protected_text: <ALIMT >(PH_1)</ALIMT>I was raised in an organ farm where my body was used to grow implants for wounded mercenaries, and although it is quite gruesome I learned a lot about medicine during it all.

text: organ_farm->Violence is what led to me being used as a body part farm, so really we should avoid it at all costs.

text: medical_assistant->I was born during a horrible war full of incendiary weapons, and during my youth I helped tend to the patients in the infirmary.

text: medical_assistant->Have you ever tended to the severely burned [recipient]? It leaves you scarred, it really changes something in you.

text: cult_child->I was raised to hate technology by my cult, but when I was able to see the real world I left it immediately.
protected_text: <ALIMT >(PH_1)</ALIMT>I was raised to hate technology by my cult, but when I was able to see the real world I left it immediately.

text: cult_child->Have you ever been part of a cult, [recipient]? You probably wouldn't understand.

text: cult_child->I was always told that any illness was solvable through soul-cleansing rituals.
protected_text: <ALIMT >(PH_1)</ALIMT>I was always told that any illness was solvable through soul-cleansing rituals.

text: story_writer->I used to spend all my time at the local library until it closed down. Once that happened, I began writing my own books.

protected_text: <ALIMT >(PH_1)</ALIMT>Books have always been my addiction, so one day I decided to start making my own!

text: story_writer->I have always loved books, and when I couldn't find more to read I started to create my own.

text: medieval_slave->I was born and raised into slavery, I have the scars and the work ethic to prove it.
protected_text: <ALIMT >(PH_1)</ALIMT>I was born and raised into slavery, I have the scars and the work ethic to prove it.

text: medieval_slave->Have you heard of the worlds stuck in the medieval ages [recipient]? I was a slave on one of those.

protected_text: <ALIMT >(PH_1)</ALIMT>I grew up digging holes and pushing carts for my <ALIMT >slave</ALIMT> owners.

text: medieval_lord->On my planet I was a noble, being pampered from my youth to adulthood with fine food and entertainment by my servants.
protected_text: <ALIMT >(PH_1)</ALIMT>On my planet I was a noble, being pampered from my youth to adulthood with fine food and entertainment by my servants.

text: medieval_lord->I've never really been a fan of manual labor [recipient], my servants always did it for me.

text: convent_child->I cannot believe we are using any sort of technology! It's all heresy, just ask the nuns that raised me!
protected_text: <ALIMT >(PH_1)</ALIMT>I cannot believe we are using any sort of technology! It's all heresy, just ask the nuns that raised me!

text: convent_child->I was born under an affair and sent off to be raised at a convent. Hard work and submission are the most important qualities one can have.
protected_text: <ALIMT >(PH_1)</ALIMT>I was born under an affair and sent off to be raised at a convent. Hard work and submission are the most important qualities one can have.

text: convent_child->Well [recipient], I was raised by nuns in a convent. What more can I say?

text: country_person->I was part of a noble family, being taught horseback riding, politics, and religion.
protected_text: <ALIMT >(PH_1)</ALIMT>I was part of a noble family, being taught horseback riding, politics, and religion.

text: shipbound_person->I grew up on a powerful ship [recipient]. It was a grand starship, of the likes you have probably never seen!

text: pampered_person->I was what most would call a spoiled brat, but I did learn a thing or two about manipulation from the royal staff.
protected_text: <ALIMT >(PH_1)</ALIMT>I was what most would call a spoiled brat, but I did learn a thing or two about manipulation from the royal staff.

text: pampered_person->My brother was my parents favorite, he was set to be their heir. Truly, I came out on top as I got all the royal benefits without the politics!

text: unwanted_survivor->My noble family did their best to try and kill me by giving me tasks without proper preparation, but honestly all they did was make me stronger.
protected_text: <ALIMT >(PH_1)</ALIMT>My noble family did their best to try and kill me by giving me tasks without proper preparation, but honestly all they did was make me stronger.

text: unwanted_survivor->I was often sent into dangerous warzones to deal with political matters by my family. Sometimes I think they wanted to get rid of me...

protected_text: <ALIMT >(PH_1)</ALIMT>Growing up I had never even seen a plant or animal, and to this day they still creep me out!

text: ship_child->Growing up with the starships crafting crew was like having another family.
protected_text: <ALIMT >(PH_1)</ALIMT>Growing up with the starships crafting crew was like having another family.
